requirements.summary: Wrap the main App component with I18nProvider in frontend/src/main.tsx to resolve the 'useI18n must be used within an I18nProvider' error
acceptanceCriteria: The I18nProvider component wraps the App component in main.tsx
The application loads without the I18n provider error
All existing i18n functionality continues to work correctly

file_operations.description: Import I18nProvider from frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx and wrap the App component with I18nProvider, ensuring it is placed inside the QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider but outside the App component. Preserve all existing authentication and query provider wrappers without modification.
